name: Crank! Push! Tilt! for the Playdate
name_original: Crank! Push! Tilt! for the Playdate
description:
👉 Crank! Push! Tilt! is a tiny arcade-style dexterity game for the Playdate. Go for the high score as you turn the crank, push A or B or tilt your Playdate left or right when prompted. When you complete the wrong action or take too much time, your game is over! The game speeds up as your score climbs higher. Crank! Push! Tilt! is easy to learn and fast to play.

Thank you for considering playing my game. I hope you enjoy it!

📒 For help sideloading Crank! Push! Tilt! onto your Playdate, please refer to the official Playdate instructions. Feedback and bug reports are welcome!

🏆 Our extremely official World Record score is currently 69, scored by me, Justin Burdett on 3/12/2023. Got a higher score? Let me know with a screenshot! :)

ℹ️ Crank! Push! Tilt! was made by me, Justin Burdett, using Playdate Pulp, which is pretty neat.
